mapper.select: select nvl(count(*), 0) from adoptboard where postDisable = 0 and petType = #{value}
mapper.update: update adoptboard set tel = #{tel}, content = #{content}, place = #{place}, petDetail = #{petDetail}, petName = #{petName}, petGender = #{petGender}, petType=#{petType}, petImg = #{petImg}, vaccin = #{vaccin}, neuter = #{neuter} where postId = #{postId}
update adoptboard set postDisable = 1 where postId = #{postId}
update adoptboard set readcnt = readcnt + 1 where postId = #{value}
update adoptboard set postreportcnt = postreportcnt + 1 where postId = #{value}
